raw_body: Formerly of Ferntea and Crest Fashions. Dearly beloved husband of Charmaine, loving father of Thushari, father-in-law of Ronnie, darling seeya of Thivanka and Shivangi, beloved brother of the late Eardley, Shanthi and Rohan, passed away on 8th April 2024. Remains will lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s from 9.00 a.m. on 10th April. Cremation at the General Cemetery, Borella (new crematorium) on Wednesday 10th April at 5.30 p.m.
